title: Generative AI Concept Lab
tagline: Rapid prototyping of AI-assisted creative workflows for web, print, and motion teams.

context.problem: Creative teams were stretched thin delivering bespoke visuals for campaigns, with ideation cycles taking days before reaching production.
constraints: Strict privacy requirements for training data
Skepticism around AI adoption across stakeholders

solution.approach: Established a generative AI lab to prototype brand-safe workflows, train multidisciplinary teams, and ship production-ready assets within 48 hours.
bullets: Codified prompt libraries aligned to brand language and mood boards
Developed QA checklist for bias mitigation and accessibility compliance
Integrated generative outputs into Figma and After Effects pipelines
Automated versioning and approvals through Notion + Slack integration

impact.label: Cycle Time
impact.description: Compressed creative ideation from 3 days to under 24 hours.

impact.label: Cost Offset
impact.description: Reduced outsourced concept spend across quarterly campaigns.

impact.label: Confidence
impact.description: Leadership approved scaling AI workflows across design pods.

process.title: Discovery
process.description: Audit existing creative workflows and bottlenecks.

process.title: Experimentation
process.description: Prototype prompt stacks and guardrails with design leads.

process.title: Enablement
process.description: Train teams, document SOPs, and schedule ongoing reviews.

reflection.learning: AI accelerates human creativity when paired with strong guardrails, transparent review, and brand ownership.
